mapper.select: SELECT X.RNUM, X.LANTOUR_NO, X.MEMBER_NO, X.LANTOUR_TITLE, X.LANTOUR_CONTENT, X.LANTOUR_DATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.LANTOUR_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.LANTOUR_TITLE, A.LANTOUR_CONTENT, A.LANTOUR_DATE FROM (SELECT LANTOUR_NO, MEMBER_NO, LANTOUR_TITLE, LANTOUR_CONTENT, LANTOUR_DATE FROM LANTOUR ORDER BY LANTOUR_NO DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageEnd}) X WHERE X.RNUM >= #{pageBegin}
SELECT LANTOUR_NO, MEMBER_NO, LANTOUR_TITLE, LANTOUR_CONTENT, LANTOUR_DATE FROM LANTOUR ORDER BY LANTOUR_NO DESC

SELECT X.RNUM, X.LANTOUR_NO, X.MEMBER_NO, X.LANTOUR_TITLE, X.LANTOUR_CONTENT, X.LANTOUR_DATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.LANTOUR_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.LANTOUR_TITLE, A.LANTOUR_CONTENT, A.LANTOUR_DATE FROM (SELECT LANTOUR_NO, MEMBER_NO, LANTOUR_TITLE, LANTOUR_CONTENT, LANTOUR_DATE FROM LANTOUR WHERE LANTOUR_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY LANTOUR_NO DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageEnd}) X WHERE X.RNUM >= #{pageBegin}

SELECT X.RNUM, X.LANTOUR_NO, X.MEMBER_NO, X.LANTOUR_TITLE, X.LANTOUR_CONTENT, X.LANTOUR_DATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.LANTOUR_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, A.LANTOUR_TITLE, A.LANTOUR_CONTENT, A.LANTOUR_DATE FROM (SELECT LANTOUR_NO, MEMBER_NO, LANTOUR_TITLE, LANTOUR_CONTENT, LANTOUR_DATE FROM LANTOUR WHERE ( LANTOUR_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR LANTOUR_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) ORDER BY LANTOUR_NO DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageEnd}) X WHERE X.RNUM >= #{pageBegin}
